channel.title: Adding alter
channel.description: Hi, I need to add an alter to recharge pray. im using allstar v2 i need the code or something[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2008, 02:01:43 PM[/size][hr]cmon someone must know

item.title: Adding alter
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

You must add case for ObjectID, just search for the id of another case (example 6552- Ancient Altar) and change it to pray by something like (this will not actually take prayer up)… under last “break;”

case 441: // Object ID you want to be altar
if (prayerPoints >= 99) { // if the variable for prayer points is prayerPoints
sendMessage(“You already have fully recharged prayer!”);
// Change this to what message you like…
} else {
// Here put in the variable for prayer (example; lets say it is prayerPoints it would be something like this:)
// prayerPoints == playerLevel[playerPrayer];
}
break;

NOTICE THAT THIS IS JUST AN EXAMPLE :P!

Read full topic
